Issue.creator: ales
Issue.summary: Make sure that a tx with a txid which is equal to that of a previous tx in the same block is marked as invalid
Issue.description: Currently, we validate transactions in a block as follow: given its txid, make sure the ledger doesn't have a transaction with the same txid. This is a problem because we still allow two transactions with the same txid in the same block. This JIRA tracks required changes to fix this behaviour.
